mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, b.* FROM ( SELECT r_no, c_no, r_title, r_content, r_active, r_date, r_writer FROM request WHERE r_active = 1 AND r.writer=#{value} ORDER BY r_no DESC ) b ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{page}-1) * 10 + 1) AND ((#{page}) * 10)
select r_no from request where r_writer=#{value} and r_active=0
select * from request r, (select * from apply where g_no = #{value}) a where r.r_no = a.r_no and r_active=1 order by r.r_no
SELECT count(*) FROM request WHERE c_no=#{c_no}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, r.* FROM (
SELECT * FROM request a WHERE a.r_no not in (select r_no from apply where g_no = #{g_no}) and c_no=#{c_no} and a.r_active=1 ORDER BY a.r_no ) r ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ((#{page}-1) * 10 + 1) AND ((#{page}) * 10)
select r.r_no, r.c_no, r.r_title, to_char(r_date, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') r_date from request r, apply a where r.r_no = a.r_no and r_writer=#{value}
